content: this crochet cardigan is a versatile garment designed to be customized to your exact measurements this pattern is made to measure so you don t need to obtain any gauge it can be made with any yarn and hook that you desire the design is quick to make making it a great option for those who want a quick weekend project you can customize the length fit relaxed or fitted and color to suit your preferences for my version i used bertagna goya 418 my size m uses a total of 800g of yarn which is approximately 8 skeins for any questions please feel free to contact me via instagram @kajcyika crochet
